name: inventory-service
description: Inventory service for food delivery system

scripts.build: bun build --minify --sourcemap ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target bun && bun run sentry:sourcemaps
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org nikolovlazar --project microservices-inventory-service ./dist && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org nikolovlazar --project microservices-inventory-service ./dist
